titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the New York University Archives Collection of World War II Materials MC.84
titlestmt.author: Claire Wolford.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-11-22 16:36:01 -0500.

change.item: Updated by Megan Oâ€™Shea for compliance with DACS and ACM Required Elements for Archival Description

did.unittitle: New York University Archives Collection of World War II Materials
did.abstract: The New York University Archives Collection of World War II Materials consists of material related to New York University students and alumni serving in World War II. This material was collected by Janet McNair.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: Collected by Janet McNair, clerk of the faculty.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.

bioghist.head: Biographical note
bioghist.p: Janet McNair was the clerk of the faculty at New York University.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The New York University Archives has no information about copyright ownership for this collection and is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from it. Materials in this collection, which were created in 1944, are expected to enter the public domain in 2064.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Materials found in collection; there is no documentation concerning the provenance of these materials.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; New York University Archives Collection of World War II Materials; MC.84; box number; folder number; New York University Archives, New York University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Decisions regarding arrangement, description, and physical interventions for this collection prior to 2020 are unknown. In 2020 the collection level description was updated for compliance with DACS and ACM Required Elements for Archival Description.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The New York University Archives Collection of World War II Materials consists of material related to New York University students and alumni serving in World War II.

did.unittitle: Alumni and students in World War II
Alumni and students in World War II (undergraduates in services)
